pkgmetadata.longdescription: `webint` helps you build a web interface.## Usage !bash mkdir example.site && cd example.site poetry init --name=example-site poetry add webint poetry run web scaffold poetry version minor poetry publish web config --host digitalocean --token {YOUR_TOKEN} web init example.site example-site example:app### Hack !bash poetry run web run example:app --port 9999Changes to your python code will auto-reload the local development server.#### Deploy an update !bash poetry version (major|minor|patch) poetry publishWait a couple minutes and update your site at https://example.site/system/software
